title: Genetic tagging may help conserve the world's wildlife

title_detail.value: Genetic tagging may help conserve the world's wildlife

summary: Tracking animals using DNA signatures are ideally suited to answer the pressing questions required to conserve the world's wildlife, providing benefits over invasive methods such as ear tags and collars, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: Tracking animals using DNA signatures are ideally suited to answer the pressing questions required to conserve the world's wildlife, providing benefits over invasive methods such as ear tags and collars, according to a new study.
